summary:
Personality
Ambitious and disciplined with good communication skills and critical thinking abilities. A good team player always striving for achieving the best possible in any situation. Flexible and easily adapting to new environments and cultures. 
International experienced with excellent interpersonal skills.
Identifying and pursuing new market and business opportunities are one of my strengths. 

In the past 14 years I have been working in the field of Photovoltaics, Solar Energy. 

I lived in Seville, Shanghai and Singapore as part of my Bachelor of Commerce (BCom.) and Masters of Science (MSc., graduated with distinction) 

I worked in Singapore as Account Manager Europe and Customer Service Manager EMEA in the aviation industry. 

In 2008 I started working as International Account Manager PV for ELDRA B.V. (Opco. of the TKH Group, EURONEXT: TWEKA) 
In this position I was involved strategic decision making and obtained my International Sales and Marketing skills. Our team managed to become market leader in large parts of Europe. 
I was appointed Sales Manager Export at SOLINQ, a spin-off under the TKH Group umbrella, followed by carrying the total responsibility of sales of PV managing a great team. 
As one of 16 “high-potentials” (hand-picked by the Board of Directors out of >5000 employees worldwide) I completed a Management Development Program at the prestigious NEYENRODE Business. After completion I was offered the MD position at SOLINQ, which I respectfully declined and started a new business being a major shareholder.

As International Sales Manager at SOLARWATT I focus on expanding Internationally in countries where SOLARWATT doesn’t have subsidiaries (RoW). After this I got the responsibility over the RoW region as Head of Selected Markets International at SOLARWATT.
My strategic focus had been on the Nordics, the UK and Ireland and moved to the position of Sales Director with the responsibility over these strategic markets. 

In 2020 I started the process of starting up a SOLARWATT UK subsidiary and became Managing Director of this organisation.

Short-term goal 
Grow SOLARWATT's international business of PV modules focusing on the VISION Glass Glass technology.
Position SOLARWATT as one of the top players in the premium segment in my markets. 10% market share within our focus segments being the minimum i would be comfortable with. 

Focus segments: Residential, (small) commercial, Agricultural

treasury_media.title: How robust are SOLARWATT's Vision PV Modules?
treasury_media.description: PV panels don't get any more robust than the SOLARWATT VISION Glass-Glass panels.

treasury_media.title: Load Test: How robust are SOLARWATT's Vision PV Modules?

These are the strongest panels on the market. Ultra robust, long-lasting and durable. Best choice for anyone who values real quality and reliable products.

More information on our Modules: https://www.solarwatt.com/

treasury_media.title: Intro to Vision glass-glass panels
treasury_media.description:
Why do we call our Vision glass-glass panels the 'generational panels'? They last for decades!
Industry leading and 100% reliable warranties from Germany

profile_positions.description: Leading the way for SOLARWATT for Sweden, Finland, Denmark, Norway, UK and Ireland
profile_positions.title: Sales Director Nordics, UK & Ireland
Dpty. Head of Selected Markets International

profile_positions.description:
SOLARWATT is a fast-growing German manufacturer of premium-quality Solar panels and storage systems. With 23 years’ experience, the German company is a recognised innovation leader, with its complete dual-glass photovoltaic solar panels (VISION), intelligent energy management systems and the unrivalled MyReserve storage solution, which together produce outstanding operational and financial efficiencies. 

All modules are produced in its state-of-the-art manufacturing plant in Dresden, living up to BMW quality standard as BMW and SOLARWATT have the same main shareholder. 

SOLARWATT’s exceptional quality is displayed by the excellent warranty conditions of 30 years (product warranty AND performance warranty of 87% after 30 years) for the full portfolio of its Glass-Glass modules (up to 305Wp with a 60 cell configuration). 
These modules are extremely durable and can bear loads up to 9000Pa., are 100% PID free, increased fire protected and with a lifetime exceeding 40 years, the yield is 35%-40% higher as compared to other solar modules. The cells are optimally protected and nearly unbreakable.

The selection of quality materials, glass of the highest standards, EVA foil with superior characteristics and superior production and lamination techniques ensure the highest quality products with the longest lifetimes. 

In the position as International Sales Manager the focus in 2017 is expansion of the Premium Partner network around the globe, emphasizing PV system sales - the combination of dual glass modules, MyReserve Storage systems, inverters and mounting materials. 

Please contact me for any inquiries regarding the dual glass solar modules and the unrivalled and ground-breaking MyReserve storage system and Energy Management Solutions.
profile_positions.title: International Sales Manager

profile_positions.description:
VDS Solar Systems originated from Solinq B.V, formerly known as a brand of ELDRA B.V. 
As a member of the management team of Solinq B.V, myself and the former Director of Solinq B.V took over the project business and founded VDS Solar Systems as a reliable and professional partner for Photovoltaic projects for businesses, Agricultural roofs and for house owners. 

Sales and professional consulting was the main focus with the goal of generating turn-over in PV projects. 

As former GDA I carried the title of Sales Director. 

Main tasks:
-	Selecting quality assortment for new business.
-	Supplier Selection. Setting up purchase channels from existing network and negotiating   purchase terms and conditions.
-       Quality Control
-	Project sales (B2B and B2C), biggest project being 250kWp.
-	Project engineering. This involved module selection, inverter configuration and sizing, DC cabling plans and design, String design, Overvoltage protection design, Logistics and project planning, Customer contact as well as supplier contacts, Roof design, Installation management.
-	Development of complete project proposals (Turn-key).
-	Turn-Key Project sales.
-	Negotiating project proposals.
-	Component sales and distribution.
-	Customer Acquisition (B2B, B2C, end users and wholesale).
-	Business and project presentations.
-	Training presentations.
-	Maintenance contracts.
-	Specializing in String inverter and Micro Inverter technologies as well as power optimizer technologies.
-	Attending Exhibitions for acquisition and new markets.
-	Exploiting marketing activities: writing brochures, advertisements and flyers. 
-	Website text generation .
-	Writing business plans.
-	Making sales forecasts.
-	Making sales catalog and pricelists for component sales as well as complete projects.
-	Matching product offering to specific customer demands for “special” projects.
profile_positions.title: Sales Director

profile_positions.description:
Growing from previous position, moving next to Managing Director with end responsibility for commercial matters.

Sales Manager Europe responsible for the total sales, acquisition, market development and account management for the European market and upcoming markets in addition to responsibilities described under Project/Sales Manager Export. 
Also the co-organisation of marketing activities was part of my role. Among other things, I was end responsible for the Intersolar fair in 2013 in Munich.
profile_positions.title: Sales Manager Europe

profile_positions.description:
Eldra Electro-Draad b.v (Ittervoort). Project Manager  responsible for sales and acquisition activities for Photovoltaïc products in the Netherlands, Belgium, Luxemburg, France, Portugal, Spain, Greece, Israel, Demark and upcoming markets. An independent role to make sure the region where I am responsible for expands in a deep and broad way. Developing and penetrating new markets and setting up market strategies to generate “body” to set up a independent company for PV products as a new company under the TKH Holding Group as a spin-off for Eldra Electro-Draad bv, named SOLINQ bv. The position is best described as Sales Manager Export and the Netherlands.
Tasks:
o	Sales 
o	Acquisition
o	Cost and sales calculations
o	Co-responsible for setting up a new BU for PV products 
o	Marketing activities
o	Enhancing total customer base
o	Visit fares and company exposure enhancement
o	Finding new ways to grow
o	Strategic business planning
o	Instructing inside sales colleagues
o	Project supervision (Turn-Key PV projects)
o	Customer visits, planning, arranging, executing 
o	Own day planning (fully self responsible)
o	Business trips to visit customers, mainly abroad
o	Dealing with major customer complaints
o	Responsible for overall customer satisfaction
o	Dealing with customer communication in case of production issues
o	Assortment enhancement
o	General communication with internal and external customers
o	Communication with top management 
o	New customer arrangements and communication
o	New product presentations
